complaint.description: Vodacom increased my monthly contract cost without my knowledge.
complaint.suggestion: Vodacom should inform customers before increasing their monthly costs and provide an option to opt-out if desired.

meta.review_title: Vodacom increased monthly costs without approval.
meta.review_content: Vodacom has increased my monthly contract cost without my knowledge. Amazing how it always gets more and that you can't speak to a person only some robot.
